turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need you to place an order for me at the Starbucks on Alpine Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Tell me what you'd like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a grande white chocolate mocha with no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What kind of milk would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, um...how about non-fat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Let me place the order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I've placed the order. Is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Can you repeat the order back to me? I want to make sure you got it right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I have a grande white chocolate mocha without whipped cream and made with non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think that will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. You should be able to pick up your order shortly at the Alpine Avenue location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'll be getting your receipt on your phone soon via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye
